title: Kilmarnock v Rangers: Team news
title_page: Kilmarnock v Rangers: Team news - BBC Sport
maintext:
Joe Wright, Kyle Vassell and Rory McKenzie are all working hard to be fit for Kilmarnock. Liam Donnelly is behind on fitness levels after re-signing in midweek and will be assessed.
Ben Davies (illness) will miss Rangersâ€™ trip to Rugby Park while Ridvan Yilmaz and Tom Lawrence have minor injuries. Connor Goldson comes back into the squad after missing the end of last season with a foot problem while Ecuador midfielder Jose Cifuentes is also included after signing this week.
